column1: Kata Robata////I highly recommend getting the chutoro
column2: which is medium fatty tuna. It's a bit pricey (4 pieces sashimi for $18)
column3: but boy is it worth it. It was probably the most tender
column4: fatty piece of raw fish I've ever eaten. It almost melted in my mouth. Now I normally don't enjoy eating raw fish or anything raw
column5: but this made me a believer.
